### db.properties
```
[root@ip-172-31-1-64 ~]# cat /etc/cloudera-scm-server/db.properties
# Auto-generated by scm_prepare_database.sh on Thu Dec  8 20:55:55 EST 2016
#
# For information describing how to configure the Cloudera Manager Server
# to connect to databases, see the "Cloudera Manager Installation Guide."
#
com.cloudera.cmf.db.type=mysql
com.cloudera.cmf.db.host=ip-172-31-1-65.us-west-2.compute.internal
com.cloudera.cmf.db.name=scm
com.cloudera.cmf.db.user=root
com.cloudera.cmf.db.password=netweb
com.cloudera.cmf.db.setupType=EXTERNAL
```
